sentence.Network_en: Smoking places you at serious risk of cardiovascular and respiratory disease.

list.abs: Re:英语实用分类词汇 ... respiratory failure 呼吸衰竭 respiratory insufficiency 呼吸功能不全 respiratory movement 呼吸运动.
呼吸衰竭 (Respiratory Failure) 概述 ? 肺的功能肺泡大气 – 外呼吸 ? 通气与换气 – 防御 ? 特异性与非特异性 – 滤过 – 代谢.
respirator 人工呼吸器面罩respiratory enzyme 呼吸酶respiratory pigment 呼吸色素

example.ex: If you smoke then the whole respiratory system is constantly under attack.
example.tran: 如果抽烟，整个呼吸系统就会一直受到损害。
